alert.note: Alert for Harris (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 09 at 12:33AM CST until further notice by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Houston/Galveston TX has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Texas... Briar Branch near Campbell Road affecting Harris County. For the Buffalo Bayou...including Addicks, Katy, Clay Road, Campbell Road, Pederson Road, West Belt Drive, Fulshear, Katy, Prince Creek Road, Bingle Road, Brittmoore Road, Piney Point Village, San Felipe Road, Shepherd Drive, Milam Drive, Turning Basin...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM EARLY THIS MORNING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Briar Branch Campbell Road. * WHEN...From early this morning until further notice. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 12:25 AM CST Sunday the stage was 71.3 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 12:25 AM CST Sunday was 71.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to remain steady above flood stage at 71.6 feet. - Flood stage is 71.2 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 71.7 feet on 08/27/2017. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (unknown time) Location Stg Stg Day/Time d1 d2 d3 Briar Branch Campbell Roa 71.2 71.3 Sun 12 am CS MSG MSG MSG &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this afternoon at 1245 PM CST.
